MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcei EfxDirectFilter = int32(131077)

Docs.summary: (EFX Extension) This Source property is used to apply filtering on the direct-path (dry signal) of a Source.
